'''Stir-Fried Filet''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The [[recipe]] for Stir-Fried Filet is obtainable from a chest on top of [[Mt. Tianheng]].

Depending on the quality, Stir-Fried Filet revives and restores '''50'''/'''100'''/'''150''' HP to the target fallen character with a 120-second cooldown. Like most foods, this can not target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].
